item.title: How do i change levels?
item.dc:creator: @dirtbikeman2012 dirtbikeman2012
item.description:
@dirtbikeman2012 wrote:

ahh, to change the max lvl (att, str, ect.) in ur client.java search for “99”; my base is testscape, might be different for other bases… once u see something similer 2 [code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) { [/code]

the red is where u would change the max skill lvl, i think once u change that skill lvl ur cb lvls will follow 2 185 im not sure tho
